page.title: 20HENLLAN: A CHANGING SCENE
page.content:
SINCE WORLD WAR 11:
1. The population has doubled _ and become more anglicised due to the influx of residents from N.W.England
2. The village has lost:- a drapers', a greengrocer,2 butchers,2 bakeries, a smithy, mill and limestone quarry
The DOMESDAY PROJECT TEAM acknowledges the assistance of the people of Henllan. The team comprised:
Forms 1F & 1W; Lower VI Geographers; Ms J Walker(computers),Mrs R Duckett (History), Miss J Walters (R.E.), Mr K Bailey (Geography), Mr J Jenkins (Head of Geography), Mr P Jones (Head of Humanities).
DENBIGH HIGH SCHOOL. July I985.
